caller_intent: Kobe is following up on a general liability insurance quote for Dale Folk's business, clarifying whether the warehouse coverage line is necessary and adjusting the premium basis from $50,000 to $10,000 for the antique store portion.
resolution_steps: Confirmed Dale's business model is an online antique store, not a warehouse, justifying removal of the warehouse line.
Adjusted the premium basis for the antique store from $50,000 to $10,000 to provide rate relief while noting audit implications.
Explained the distinction between warehouse and antique store class codes, emphasizing auditability and pricing differences.
Clarified that the property quote is optional and not required for the general liability coverage.
Offered to send the business website link for further verification.
knowledge_required: Insurance class codes for warehouses vs. antique stores
Premium basis adjustments and audit implications
Differentiation between property and general liability coverage
summary: Kobe clarified an insurance quote for Dale Folk's online antique store business, removing unnecessary warehouse coverage and adjusting the premium basis to align with the business model. Jeff agreed to the changes, and Kobe offered to share the website link for verification. The call concluded with mutual agreement on the adjusted quote.
